youtube.title: How Breastfeeding Affects the Mother's Brain | Biological Process
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating biological connection between a mother and her child. This 3D animation explores the hormonal triggers and physiological changes that occur in the brain and body during breastfeeding. Learn about the science of lactation and the 'bonding hormone' in action.
